misuses.misuse: CWE-757: Selection of Less-Secure Algorithm During Negotiation
misuses.description: The use of the RC4 cipher is not recommended due to its weakness and vulnerability to attacks.
misuses.recommendation: Use a more secure cipher such as AES instead.

misuses.description: The use of a low iteration number or a weak key may lead to inadequate encryption strength.
misuses.recommendation: Use a higher iteration number and a stronger key.

misuses.misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
misuses.description: The use of a broken or risky cryptographic algorithm may lead to security vulnerabilities.
misuses.recommendation: Use a secure and recommended cryptographic algorithm instead.
